text: The Bluebird Vision Propane is a conventional Type C school bus made by the American company Bluebird. The Vision has many flexible fuel and passenger configurations. As of 2024, The vision is available in diesel, gasoline, electric, CNG, and Propane. The vision's predecessor was the Chevy/GMC CV200. The vision can also be used as an activity bus. == References == Category:Vehicles
title: Blue Bird Vision
